definitions.definition: An acute febrile disease of the (sub) tropics caused by the Dengue virus , a flavivirus , transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes , and characterized by high fever , rash , headache , and severe muscle and joint pain .

main_definition: An acute febrile disease of the (sub) tropics caused by the Dengue virus , a flavivirus , transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes , and characterized by high fever , rash , headache , and severe muscle and joint pain .
